name: SIngle Room
info: Sterling Shores is a holiday home is set in Destin is 1.3 km from Big Kahunas. The holiday home is 1.4 km from Beaches of South Walton.

name: Double Room
info: Free WiFi, a flat-screen cable TV, and refrigerator are standard in every room at Surfside Beach Resort. Extras include a coffee machine, microwave, and bathroom with granite vanity counter-tops.

name: Family Room
info: The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a microwave and a fridge and there is a private bathroom.
